title: Absolutely adorable with new appliances and flooring!
map_address: 1799 North Decatur Boulevard near Lake Mead
posting_body: ['Your Home.', 'Your Life.', 'Our Commitment.', '1 Bedroom 1 Bath (1B)  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 745 Sq.Ft', 'Diamondhead', 'Address:', '1799 North Decatur Boulevard Las Vegas, NV 89108', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'Property Description', 'Move into this home in a one-bedroom, one-bathroom floor plan from Diamondhead and experience the resort-like apartment lifestyle!', 'Your mornings can begin by freshening up in the en-suite bathroom, where you can enjoy a soak in the deep Roman tub.', 'The walk-in closet not helps with wardrobe storage but doubles as a changing room where you can organize your outfit for the day.', 'After getting dressed, enjoy the morning sun for a few minutes on your private patio.', 'Before heading out, prepare a quick meal in the galley kitchen, where every appliance and dish is convenient to your reach.', 'After a long day, come back and enjoy a dip in the cool resort-like pool, or just soak your worries away in the nearby spa.', 'The famed Las Vegas Strip is nearby as well, in case you’d like to visit.', 'All of these are mere samples of the apartment life here at Diamondhead.', 'Much more remains to discover.', 'Call now to learn more.', 'Floor Plan/Unit Features', '* Full-Size Washer and Dryer', '*', 'Soaking Tub', '* Walk-In Closets', '* Wood Vinyl Flooring', '* Walk-In Closet', '* Espresso Cabinet Upgrade', 'Property
